mapper.select: select a.uid uid , displayname , email , bannerId , phoneNumber , photoUrl , tokenGoogle , passwd , basicAgeType , basicStyle , (SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT("itemId", itemId)) FROM userLikeItem where uid = uid ) userLikeItem , (SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT("storeId", storeId)) FROM userAddStore where uid = uid ) storeId , (SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT("itemId", itemId)) FROM userRecentlyproducts where uid = uid) userRecentlyproductsItem from user a inner join userAddStore ia on a.uid = ia.uid inner join userStyle us on a.uid = us.uid WHERE email = #{email}

Select adintro.adId , dataAd , emgContent , emgTitle , lastAos , lastIos , upMsgAos , upMsgIos , verAos , verIos , a.adId , cnt , startDate , endDate , cntMax , a2.adId , adDetailUrl , adMsg , adNo , adStoreName , adUrl , upTitleAos, upTitleIos From adintro left JOIN ad a on adintro.adId = adintro.adId left JOIN addata a2 on a.adId = a.adId;

Select adintro.adId , dataAd , emgContent , emgTitle , lastAos , lastIos , upMsgAos , upMsgIos , verAos , verIos , upTitleAos, upTitleIos , ( SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT("adId", adId ,"adDetailUrl" , adDetailUrl , "adMsg" , adMsg , "adNo" , adNo , "adStoreName" , adStoreName)) FROM addata ) adData, ( SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT("adId", adId , "imgUrl" , imgUrl , "itemClickUrl" , itemClickUrl , "bannerType" , bannerType)) FROM mainbanneritem adItem) adItem From adintro inner JOIN ad a on adintro.adId = a.adId inner join ad a2 on adintro.adId = a2.adId ;
SELECT adId, cnt, startDate, endDate, cntMax FROM `ad`
SELECT adId, adDetailUrl, adMsg, adNo, adStoreName, adUrl FROM `adData`
SELECT eventId, clickCount, endDate, eventContent, imgUrlContent, imgUrlMain, startDate , eventClickUrl FROM `event`
SELECT shopId, shopItemDetailUrl, shopItemName, shopItemPriceOriginal, shopItemPriceSale, shopItemUrl, shopTitle, itemId , itemCategori , itemDetailUrl FROM `item`

SELECT shopId , addInfoAsPhone , addInfoCeo , addInfoChangePay , addInfoEmail , addInfoInternetConfirmNumber , addInfoTranAutoType , addInfoTranCustomerCode , addInfoTranName , addInfoTransAddNumber , addInfoTransRecallAdd , addInfoWorkingTime , basicAgeType , basicStyle , basicTitleWord , shopCountItemClick , shopCountLike , shopHomepage , shopMainImg , shopName FROM `shops`
select newitem.itemId , newitem.shopTitle , shopItemDetailUrl from newitem inner join item i on 1000000322 = i.itemId;
select adStoreName , adNo , adMsg , imgUrl , adDetailUrl , itemClickUrl , bannerType from mainbanneritem left join addata a on mainbanneritem.adId = a.adId;

select newitem.uid , REPLACE(shopItemPriceSale , '￦' , ''), newitem.shopTitle , newitem.updateTime , shopItemUrl , shopItemName , shopItemDetailUrl , shopItemPriceOriginal , shopItemPriceSale, itemCategori , itemDetailUrl, s.itemId , s.shopId from newitem inner join item s on newitem.itemId = s.itemId left join tbCount tC on newitem.uid = tC.uid order by newitem.uid desc limit #{position} , 16;

select tbCodiListItem.uid , shopItemPriceSale , s.shopTitle , s.updateTime , shopItemUrl , shopItemName , shopItemDetailUrl , shopItemPriceOriginal , shopItemPriceSale, itemCategori , itemDetailUrl , s.itemId , s.shopId from tbCodiListItem left join item s on tbCodiListItem.codiId = s.itemId order by tbCodiListItem.uid desc limit #{position} , 16;

select tbMDListItem.uid , shopItemPriceSale , s.shopTitle , s.updateTime , shopItemUrl , shopItemName , shopItemDetailUrl , shopItemPriceOriginal , itemCategori , itemDetailUrl , s.itemId , s.shopId from tbMDListItem left join item s on tbMDListItem.mdItemId = s.itemId order by tbMDListItem.uid desc limit #{position} , 16;
